metadata.title: CVE-2024-0814 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in Payments in Google Chrome prior to 121.0.6167.85allowed a remote attacker to potentially spoof security UI via a craftedHTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
